

Introduction to OATS
================================
Optimisation and Analysis Toolbox for power Systems (OATS) is a high-level modelling
and simulation tool for power system analysis, developed at the University of Strathclyde.
OATS is a collection of optimisation models and Python scripts for analysis and solution of a
range of power system analysis problems.


.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    intro/license
    intro/citation
